segments.text: Could you recommend something to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , since you have order the roast chicken . I suggest you to order the red wine to go with the main course . It can help you digest the food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We would also like some alcohol before the main dish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think whiskey will be a good choice .
segments.speaker: S2
